subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Everett Golson hit tight end Ben Koyack in the corner of the end zone with 61 seconds left, as No. 9 Notre Dame overcame a sloppy performance to defeat visiting No. 14 Stanford.
snippet: Quarterback Everett Golson hit tight end Ben Koyack in the corner of the end zone with 61 seconds left, as No. 9 Notre Dame overcame a sloppy performance to defeat visiting No. 14 Stanford.
